subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: As a jockey's agent, Ron Anderson must be a sharp handicapper, a methodical thinker, a full-time travel agent, a part-time shrink and a sometime whipping boy.
snippet: As a jockey's agent, Ron Anderson must be a sharp handicapper, a methodical thinker, a full-time travel agent, a part-time shrink and a sometime whipping boy.
